SELECT A.row_num , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.MEM_NICKNAME , A.BOARD_REG , A.BOARD_VIEW_CNT , A.BOARD_LIKE_CNT , A.BOARD_BOOKMARK_CNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
ORDER BY B.BOARD_VIEW_CNT DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARD_LIKE_CNT DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARD_BOOKMARK_CNT DESC
) AS row_num , B.BOARD_TITLE , M.MEM_NICKNAME , B.BOARD_REG , B.BOARD_VIEW_CNT , B.BOARD_LIKE_CNT , B.BOARD_BOOKMARK_CNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID ) A WHERE A.row_num <= 5

SELECT B.BOARD_ID , B.BOARD_TITLE , M.MEM_NICKNAME , B.BOARD_REG , B.BOARD_VIEW_CNT , B.BOARD_LIKE_CNT , B.BOARD_BOOKMARK_CNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID ORDER BY B.BOARD_REG DESC
